alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:46PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 245 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Pinto Summit to 14 miles southeast of Eureka to 23 miles north of Duckwater. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinto Summit and Pancake Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
